import React from "react"; import Avatar from "react-avatar"; import { FaTimes } from "react-icons/fa"; const MyInfo = ({ user }) => { return (
{/* Profile Card */}
{user.firstName} {user.lastName}
ID: {user._id || user.id}
Referred friend: 0
SC 0 Earned

{user.stats?.wins || 0}

); }; export default MyInfo;
